mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, name, nickname, phone_number, birth_date, gender, introduce, photo) values(#{email}, sha2(#{password},256), #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{introduce}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, introduce=#{introduce}, photo=#{photo} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_id, email, name, photo, introduce from member
select member_id, email, name, photo, introduce from member where member_id=#{value}
select member_id, email, name, nickname, phone_number, birth_date, introduce, photo from member where email= #{email} and password=sha2(#{password},256)
